philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.heading: Connecting hearts and land,<0/> <1>weaving stories through time</1>
philosophy.description1: We, Discovery Hidden Japan, connect travelers with regions and bring the hidden beauty and stories of Japan to the world.
philosophy.description2: We cherish encounters with authentic life, culture, and atmosphere found beyond over-commercialized tourist destinations, and redefine the value of travel.
philosophy.description3: By serving as a bridge connecting regions and travelers, and addressing social issues through alleviating overtourism and regional revitalization, we advocate for a <0>new era of tourism</0> woven through people, regions, and the world.

shoKishiro.background: After working at a travel agency, he worked for many years at foreign IT companies including Booking.com and Meta. He specializes in strategic planning for new inbound businesses and consulting for local governments, with numerous individual consulting achievements.

yoshihiroFujimoto.background: Joined after experience at major manufacturers, major consulting firms, and Microsoft. Capable of proposing operational efficiency improvements using IT technology, such as sales of customer management tools and proposals for IT solutions.

takashiAoki.background: Resides in Cebu, Philippines. With diverse experience including international cooperation in NGOs, management of BPO operations, restaurant management, and social entrepreneurship, he can solve problems without being bound by existing concepts.

junkoOkabe.background: Worked at JTB for over 30 years, with deep experience in tour development for Southeast Asia and Australia, including the Philippines.

ayanoFujimoto.background: Moved to NY, USA alone at 18. After obtaining a degree and working at a travel agency, she returned to Japan. After working at Booking.com and Google, she moved to Microsoft in 2024. Specializes in the travel industry and digital marketing, with numerous achievements with clients in various industries.
